name: Black Metal
description: Highly distorted, treble-heavy guitars, tremolo-picked riffs, blast beats and double bass drumming, shrieked vocals, and raw, lo-fi production; often focuses on occult, dark imagery and atmosphere.

children.name: Atmospheric Black Metal
children.description: Repetitive riffs and melodies, slower tempos, synthesized ambient textures, and guitar effects creating atmospheric soundscapes.

children.name: Atmospheric Black Metal
children.description: Repetitive riffs and melodies, slower tempos, synthesized ambient textures, and guitar effects creating atmospheric soundscapes.

children.name: Black 'n' Roll
children.description: Incorporates elements of Hard Rock, Glam Rock, and Heavy Metal.

children.name: Black 'n' Roll
children.description: Incorporates elements of Hard Rock, Glam Rock, and Heavy Metal.

children.name: Black Noise
children.description: Incorporates unconventional sounds with overpowering or constant Noise and Black Metal elements, often being heavily texture-oriented, abrasive, dissonant, atonal, or repetitive.

children.name: Black Noise
children.description: Incorporates unconventional sounds with overpowering or constant Noise and Black Metal elements, often being heavily texture-oriented, abrasive, dissonant, atonal, or repetitive.

children.name: DSBM
children.description: Lethargic, melancholic, and repetitive sound; depressive and misanthropic themes; vocals ranging from high-pitched wails and screams to strained cleans; often featuring non-distorted sections.

children.name: DSBM
children.description: Lethargic, melancholic, and repetitive sound; depressive and misanthropic themes; vocals ranging from high-pitched wails and screams to strained cleans; often featuring non-distorted sections.

children.name: Dissonant Black Metal
children.description: Dissonant atonal riffing, cleaner production style, and complex song structures.

children.name: Dissonant Black Metal
children.description: Dissonant atonal riffing, cleaner production style, and complex song structures.

children.name: Hellenic Black Metal
children.description: Black metal scene in Greece with more mid-tempo songwriting and pronounced Heavy Metal influence.

children.name: Hellenic Black Metal
children.description: Black metal scene in Greece with more mid-tempo songwriting and pronounced Heavy Metal influence.

children.name: Melodic Black Metal
children.description: Cleaner production, more diverse arrangements, and a stronger emphasis on melody than is typical for Black Metal.

children.name: Melodic Black Metal
children.description: Cleaner production, more diverse arrangements, and a stronger emphasis on melody than is typical for Black Metal.

children.name: Pagan Black Metal
children.description: Incorporates acoustic guitar and traditional instrument passages, cleanly sung vocals, folk songs' melodies, and paganistic themes.

children.name: Pagan Black Metal
children.description: Incorporates acoustic guitar and traditional instrument passages, cleanly sung vocals, folk songs' melodies, and paganistic themes.

children.name: Symphonic Black Metal
children.description: Symphonic soundscapes, typically but not always synthesized.

children.name: Symphonic Black Metal
children.description: Symphonic soundscapes, typically but not always synthesized.

children.name: War Metal
children.description: Aggressive, chaotic, and heavily Death Metal-influenced, featuring muddy, bass-heavy production and often incorporating war-themed lyrics.

children.name: War Metal
children.description: Aggressive, chaotic, and heavily Death Metal-influenced, featuring muddy, bass-heavy production and often incorporating war-themed lyrics.
